name: Breakup (SpoocleMacBoogle, breadbouul, Briar Star)
description:
Akira wants to break up with his girlfriend Miyuke, but every time he hasn't had the right moment. Today he promised to himself he'd do it, but does his girlfriend have other plans?

Made for Spooktober 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam by DevTalk

Team:

Writer/Director: Nickolay Zholudev

Artist/Character Design: May Parker aka Briar Star

Artist/Location Design/Backgrounds: @breadbouul (Maggie W)

Laughter: @honestcactus

How to:

Left Mouse Button - next message

Right Mouse Button - previous message

In credits menu press left mouse button to comeback to main menu.
